name: find_symbol
description: Performs a global or local search for code symbols using the language server backend.

arguments.name: name_path_pattern
arguments.desc: Symbol name matching pattern to search for

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.desc: Optional file or directory to restrict the search to

name: find_referencing_symbols
description: Finds symbols that reference the given symbol using the language server backend.

arguments.name: name_path
arguments.desc: Target symbol identifier to find references of

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.desc: File containing the symbol

name: get_symbols_overview
description: Gets an overview of the top-level symbols defined in a given file.

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.desc: File path to get the symbol overview for

name: replace_symbol_body
description: Replaces the full definition of a symbol using the language server backend.

arguments.name: name_path
arguments.desc: Symbol identifier to replace

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.desc: File location of the symbol

arguments.name: body
arguments.desc: New symbol definition content

name: insert_after_symbol
description: Inserts content after the end of the definition of a given symbol.

arguments.name: name_path
arguments.desc: Reference symbol identifier

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.desc: File location of the symbol

arguments.name: body
arguments.desc: Content to insert after the symbol

name: insert_before_symbol
description: Inserts content before the beginning of the definition of a given symbol.

arguments.name: name_path
arguments.desc: Reference symbol identifier

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.desc: File location of the symbol

arguments.name: body
arguments.desc: Content to insert before the symbol

name: rename_symbol
description: Renames a symbol throughout the codebase using language server refactoring capabilities.

arguments.name: name_path
arguments.desc: Symbol identifier to rename

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.desc: File location of the symbol

arguments.name: new_name
arguments.desc: New name for the symbol

name: read_file
description: Reads a file within the project directory.

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.desc: Path to the file to read

name: create_text_file
description: Creates or overwrites a file in the project directory.

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.desc: Path where the file will be created

arguments.name: content
arguments.desc: Content to write to the file

name: list_dir
description: Lists files and directories in the given directory.

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.desc: Directory path to list

name: find_file
description: Finds files matching a given mask in the project.

arguments.name: file_mask
arguments.desc: File name pattern to search for

name: replace_content
description: Replaces content in a file, optionally using regular expressions.

arguments.name: relative_path
arguments.desc: Path to the file to modify

arguments.name: needle
arguments.desc: Content to search for

arguments.name: repl
arguments.desc: Replacement content

name: search_for_pattern
description: Flexible search for arbitrary patterns in the codebase, including non-code files.

arguments.name: substring_pattern
arguments.desc: Pattern to search for in the codebase

name: execute_shell_command
description: Executes a shell command and returns its output.

arguments.name: command
arguments.desc: Shell command to execute

name: restart_language_server
description: Restarts the language server, may be necessary when edits not through Serena happen.

name: onboarding
description: Performs onboarding by identifying the project structure and essential tasks.

name: write_memory
description: Writes a named memory for future reference to Serena's project-specific memory store.

arguments.name: memory_file_name
arguments.desc: Name of the memory to write

arguments.name: content
arguments.desc: Content to store in the memory

name: read_memory
description: Reads the memory with the given name from Serena's project-specific memory store.

arguments.name: memory_file_name
arguments.desc: Name of the memory to read

name: list_memories
description: Lists memories in Serena's project-specific memory store.
